segments.source_content:
---
id: grpc-service-generation-options
title: Configuring Service Method Generation
sidebar_label: Service Generation Options
---

By default, entproto will generate a number of service methods for an `ent.Schema` annotated with `ent.Service()`. Method generation can be customized by including the argument `entproto.Methods()` in the `entproto.Service()` annotation. `entproto.Methods()` accepts bit flags to determine what service methods should be generated. The flags include:

translations.zh-CN: 默认情况下，entproto会为带有`ent.Service()`注解的`ent.Schema`生成若干服务方法。通过在`entproto.Service()`注解中包含`entproto.Methods()`参数，可以自定义方法生成。`entproto.Methods()`接受位标志参数来决定应生成哪些服务方法。可用标志包括：

segments.source_content: To generate a service with multiple methods, bitwise OR the flags.

translations.zh-CN: 如需生成包含多个方法的服务，可通过位或运算组合标志。

segments.source_content: To see this in action, we can modify our ent schema. Let's say we wanted to prevent our gRPC client from mutating entries. We can accomplish this by modifying `ent/schema/user.go`:

translations.zh-CN: 我们通过修改ent模式来实践这一功能。假设需要禁止gRPC客户端执行数据变更操作，可以修改`ent/schema/user.go`文件：

segments.source_content: Re-running `go generate ./...` will give us the following service definition in `entpb.proto`:

translations.zh-CN: 重新运行`go generate ./...`后，将在`entpb.proto`中生成如下服务定义：

segments.source_content: Notice that the service no longer includes `Update` and `Delete` methods. Perfect!

translations.zh-CN: 可以看到服务定义中已移除`Update`和`Delete`方法。完美符合需求！
